code: import axios from"axios";import{getUserData}from"./Storage";axios.defaults.baseURL="https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com/v1";var API_KEY="AIzaSyCe4QrIpvw37pBDjj3FhDmA0ygRLbxgj5Q";var REGISTER_URL="/accounts:signUp?key=".concat(API_KEY);var LOGIN_URL="/accounts:signInWithPassword?key=".concat(API_KEY);var USER_DETAILS_URL="/accounts:lookup?key=".concat(API_KEY);export var RegisterApi=function RegisterApi(inputs){var data={displayName:inputs.name,email:inputs.email,password:inputs.password};return axios.post(REGISTER_URL,data);};export var LoginApi=function LoginApi(inputs){var data={email:inputs.email,password:inputs.password};return axios.post(LOGIN_URL,data);};export var UserDetailsApi=function UserDetailsApi(){var data={idToken:getUserData()};return axios.post(USER_DETAILS_URL,data);};
